Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 and up
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB VRAM

  • Additional Notes: This app features partial controller support with the Xbox One controller. Depending on the system the app might rarely show a black screen while loading. If performance drops, please restart the game once after saving and select Continue from the title screen.
